00035 
00036 namespace cinder { namespace app {
00037 
00038 class AppCocoaView : public App {
00039   public:
00040     class Settings : public App::Settings {
00041       public:
00042         Settings();
00043 
00044       private:
00045     };
00046   
00047     AppCocoaView();
00048     
00049     virtual void    prepareSettings( Settings *settings ) {}
00050     
00051     void            prepareLaunch( RendererRef defaultRenderer = RendererRef() );
00052     virtual void    setupCinderView( CinderView *cinderView, RendererRef renderer );
00053     virtual void    launch( const char *title = 0, int argc = 0, char * const argv[] = 0 );
00054 
00055     virtual void    quit() override;
00056 
00057 
00058     virtual const Settings& getSettings() const override { return mSettings; }
00059 
00061     virtual float       getFrameRate() const override;
00063     virtual void        setFrameRate( float frameRate ) override;
00065     void                disableFrameRate();
00067     bool                isFrameRateEnabled() const;
00068 
00069     virtual fs::path    getAppPath() const override;
00070     virtual size_t      getNumWindows() const override;
00071     virtual WindowRef   getWindow() const override;
00072     virtual WindowRef   getWindowIndex( size_t index ) const override;
00073     
00074   protected:
00075     Settings            mSettings;
00076     AppImplCocoaView    *mImpl;
00077 };
